title: add `schematic_group`
description: Adds a new `schematic_group` type to the codebase.

title: missing PcbHolePillWithRectPad
description: Adds a new type `PcbHolePillWithRectPad` for a PCB plated hole with a rectangular pad.

title: add links to source in README generation
description: Add links to source in README generation

title: Add manual edit events for group
description: Add manual edit events for group

title: add support for pinCompatibleVariants for chip
description: Add support for `pinCompatibleVariants` for `chip`

title: Docs Generation
description: This pull request updates the documentation generation workflow, which includes adding links to the props definitions in the README.

title: add electolytic footprint
description: Add an electrolytic footprint to the project.

title: delete test file in source dir
description: Deleting a test file in the source directory.

title: silkscreen text size to match pcb-viewer
description: Adjust the silkscreen text size to match the size used in the pcb-viewer.

title: handle silkscreen paths
description: The pull request adds handling for silkscreen paths in the BoardGeomBuilder.

title: fix: handel smtpad layers correctly
description: Fix the handling of the layers for SMT pads to ensure they are correctly flipped when necessary.

title: Update Autorouter 0.0.66
description: Update the Autorouter to version 0.0.66

title: Add support for parent group's transformation
description: Add support for parent group's transformation

title: Update Autorouter (10+ versions)
description: Update the timeout for the Bun test command in the GitHub Actions workflow.

title: Refactor issue creation metrics to include major issues and calculate contributor scores
description: Refactors the issue creation metrics to include major issues and calculate contributor scores.

title: Refactor impact assignment logic in PR analysis
description: Refactor impact assignment logic in PR analysis

title: feat: silkscreen anchor alignment
description: Adds the ability to control the alignment of silkscreen text labels on a PCB.

title: feat: Add DRC check for vias out of board
description: Adds a DRC (Design Rule Check) to detect vias that are out of the board boundary.

title: fixes resistor schRotation
description: Fixes the rotation of the resistor symbol.

title: fix all variation for led symbol
description: Fix all variations for the LED symbol

title: add support ferrite bead symbol
description: Adds support for the ferrite bead symbol

title: new schematic symbol boxresistor_small
description: Adds a new schematic symbol for a small box resistor.

title: added zigzag resistor for schSmall variant
description: Added a new zigzag resistor for the schSmall variant.

title: Add example admin page at /_fake/admin that shows thing resources
description: Adds an example admin page at /_fake/admin that shows thing resources.

title: Match the fake with prod version
description: The pull request changes the validation logic for the `order_quotes/create` API endpoint, removing the ability to provide both `circuit_json` and `package_release_id`, and instead requiring only `package_release_id`.

title: refactor(download-gltf): fix model not downlaoding
description: Fix for model not downloading in the download-gltf functionality.

title: feat: add search functionality and enhance footer links
description: The pull request adds search functionality and enhances the footer links.

title: refactor(TrendingPage): optimize package filtering and sorting logic
description: Refactor the package filtering and sorting logic in the TrendingPage component.

title: fix: jlcpcb part already imported
description: Fixes an issue where the user is shown an error message when trying to import a JLCPCB part that has already been imported.

title: fix the annoying dropdown visible on redirect
description: Fix the annoying dropdown visible on redirect

title: ensure registry token is set on window
description: Ensures that the registry token is set on the window object

title: fix: flickering issue of OrderDialog because of MobileSidebar and update runframe
description: Fix flickering issue of OrderDialog because of MobileSidebar and update `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency

title: update runframe
description: Update the version of the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency from `0.0.449` to `0.0.451`.

title: Remove babel standalone, remove shiki extra deps, remove legacy code editor, reduces bundle size 42mb -> 28mb
description: Removes babel standalone, removes shiki extra deps, removes legacy code editor, and reduces bundle size from 42mb to 28mb.

title: Add SVG Label Rendering Filtering + Rects and fixture
description: Add SVG Label Rendering Filtering + Rects and fixture

title: add backgroundColor option to matcher
description: Adds a new `backgroundColor` option to the `toMatchGraphicsSvg` matcher.

title: update capacity autorouter and core
description: Update capacity autorouter and core dependencies

title: updated core
description: Update the version of the @tscircuit/core dependency from 0.0.404 to 0.0.406.

title: add some important workflow
description: Add some important workflows for the project, including format check, publishing to npm, and running tests.

title: add format and type check workflows
description: Add format and type check workflows for the project.

title: feat(CircuitJsonPreview): add cadViewerRef and update CadViewer integration
description: Adds a new `cadViewerRef` and updates the integration with the CadViewer component in the CircuitJsonPreview component.

title: Modify the error message body according to the standard structure
description: Modify the error message body to conform to a standard structure.

title: Update CLI commands and descriptions to reflect package terminology
description: Updates CLI commands and descriptions to reflect package terminology instead of snippet.

title: docs: README update
description: Updates the README to reflect the change from "snippets" to "packages" in the CLI.

title: Support multiple files to be previewed
description: Added support for previewing multiple files in the circuit preview component.

title: Report Autorouter Bugs
description: This pull request adds documentation on how to report autorouter bugs in the tscircuit interface and how to simulate the bug using the autorouting debugger.

title: Fix bugreport1, use better force calculation using nearest-point-on-segment
description: Fixes a bug report and improves the force calculation for endpoint using the nearest point on the segment.

title: add bug report, add script to download bug reports
description: The pull request adds a bug report feature and a script to download bug reports.

title: Fix Stitch Bug
description: Fix a bug related to stitching in the JSON file.

title: Create authentication-flow.md
description: The pull request adds a new file `authentication-flow.md` that contains a Mermaid sequence diagram describing the authentication flow for the application.

title: fix callback hook
description: Fix a callback hook in the authentication flow.

title: fix broken chat by supporting github login
description: Fix broken chat by supporting GitHub login
